version_description: Fixed a level that could not be finished with the current control scheme.

Fixed a few bugs affecting the gameplay experience:
- a memory leak 
- a bug that was causing the music to stop.

The size and position of the controls.
You can now customise the on-screen controls. Enter any mission and check out the "Controls" menu, inside Options.

Several bug fixes.
The loadout is no longer reset when you switch classes before a mission.

Fixed support for iOS 9, and a couple of other bugs.

You can now customise the on-screen controls. Enter any mission and check out the "Controls" menu, inside Options.

We fixed several bugs.
The game now automatically starts in your device language.

New controller release!

Bluetooth controllers are now supported. Just connect your favorite controller, and go!
Look for the map in the settings.

Game Center Cloud Save.
Your progress is now saved in the cloud, so you can pick up the game on any device and get right back in.

Improved Controller Support.
